job.title: Senior Data Scientist - Machine Learning
job.description: stronguAbout PavebrbrustrongHere at Pave youll be joining a world class team with tremendous growth potential Were a Series B startup backed by top Silicon Valley investors Andreessen Horowitz a16z Y Combinator Continuity and Bessemer Venture PartnersbrbrThe world of compensation is broken today Pave is here to fix it Today teams cobble together hundreds of messy spreadsheets and outdated surveys to determine how to compensate their workforce Covid and remote work have made the situation far more difficult and the notion of market compensation is now confusing to everyonebrbrAt Pave you will reinvent the world of compensation and help build a more transparent future of workbrbrPave allows companies to benchmark compensation to leaders in their industry analyze internal compensation data and make the right adjustments then visually communicate compensation to their employees Were building the worlds largest realtime compensation data platform to accomplish this goal and are acquiring amazing customers like Credit Karma Discord and Allbirds at an unbelievable pace Come join our team on this missionbrbrstrongOur TeambrbrstrongDo you want to work on meaningful data science projects that truly make the world a better place Are you interested in working with the worlds largest and most complete realtime compensation dataset Would you rather spend more time delivering value than cleaning data Do you want to be a force multiplier who works with a variety of tools domains and stakeholdersbrbrAt Pave we have one of the worlds most interesting datasets seriously this is every data scientists dream We have almost every characteristic you could want from compensation characteristics to demographic characteristics to location data to well anything you could want analyze Oh did we mention it was clean If you said yes to the above come help us make a more fair and transparent world at PavebrbrstrongYour Primary FocusbrbrstrongAt Pave youll be working with product managers and other key stakeholders tobrulli understand Paves current and future products andlili design and implement models to support and grow the value those products providebrliulThis means youll bebrulli Advising leadership about potentially predictive and prescriptive solutions which would increase the value delivered by Pave to its customerslili Creating predictive models using the worlds most complete collection of realtime compensation data ever collectedlili Building pipelines to support modeling and any upstream or downstream interfaces to deliver model outputsbrliulstrongAbout Youbrbrstrongulli23 years of developing and delivering machine learning models to productionlili23 years of owning model pipelines from start to finish from data engineering cleaning modeling visualization to deliveryliliExpert knowledge of Python or R and SQLliliYou have experience and enjoy working with other stakeholders across our organization liliExperience with Looker and Airflow are nice to haves brliulstrongLife at PavebrbrstrongPave is growing incredibly fast and we have high ambition In true work hard  play hard fashion weve complemented our ambitious goals with a worldclass culture and a variety of early startup benefits As an early hire youll play a key role in shaping what this looks like but some of the benefits that we already offer includebrbrstrongCompensationstrong Competitive salary and startup equity its in our DNAbrbrstrongWellnessstrong Top tier health insurance along with exercise amp wellness benefitsbrbrstrongFoodstrong All meals while working plus snacks We take our snacking seriouslybrbrstrongTechstrong Choose your laptop and accessories of choicebrbrstrongTeamstrong Retreats happy hours and events for our team friends and familybrbrstrongFlexibleTime Offstrong Take the time you needbrbrstrongWFH Wednesdaystrong A dedicated work from home day each weekbrbrstrongLocationstrong Our company is based in San Franciscos SoMA district with a high energy inperson culturebrbrAnd much more we want all Pave employees to define the best benefits based on our combined interestsbrbrPave is committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race ethnicity gender gender identity sexual orientation protected veteran status disability age or other legally protected status For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation please email recruitingpavecom
